divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving to work from my house. The car in front of me slowed and I happened to look up to the south and there were two bright lights near eachother. I was not sure I'd they were planes or . as I was watching them one of them dropped an object to the earth that either emitted or reflected light. At first I wondered if a bomb was being dropped but therewas no sounds or explosion. I called my mom immediately. I turned my car away from the incident as I was explaining what happened and then noticed the two lights had traveled on the direction I just turned (ne) and continued their path until I no longer saw them . I figured if it were a military operation they would have gone toward the base but they did not.
trends: There have been 128 other sightings in Fort Worth
There were no other sightings in Fort Worth on or around August 20th 2012
Summary: 2 possible helicopters stationary for a moment then dropped an object to the earth
